name: Veterans Crisis Line
description: Connect with a qualified Veterans Crisis Line responder.

name: Military OneSource
description: A 24/7 resource providing military members and their families with support and information.

name: National Suicide Prevention Lifeline
description: Provides free and confidential support for people in distress.

name: Give An Hour
description: Provides free mental health care to military members and their families.

name: Operation Homefront
description: Provides financial and housing assistance to military families.
